tool_description: Calculates standardized health metrics and ratios from laboratory results and vital signs for risk assessment.

bun.description: Blood urea nitrogen level in mg/dL

applicant_age.description: Age of the applicant in years

applicant_gender.description: Gender of the applicant: male, female, other

error_messages: Invalid lab values: All provided lab values must be positive numbers.
Invalid blood pressure: Both systolic and diastolic values must be provided together and be between 70-250 mmHg.
Invalid age: Applicant age must be between 18 and 100.
Invalid gender: Use one of [male, female, other].
Insufficient data: At least one lab value must be provided for metric calculation.
usage: Provide available lab results and applicant demographics. The tool calculates relevant health ratios and metabolic indicators used in risk assessment.

cardiovascular_risk_indicators.description: Cardiovascular risk indicators based on lipid profile

diabetes_risk_indicators.description: Diabetes risk indicators based on glucose measures

kidney_function_indicators.description: Kidney function status based on creatinine and BUN

liver_function_indicators.description: Liver function status based on enzyme levels

metabolic_syndrome_score.description: Risk score for metabolic syndrome (0-10 scale)
